dcterms:creator: I. Armeni
A. Sax
A. R. Zamir
S. Savarese
dcterms:description: The Stanford Large-Scale 3D Indoor Spaces Dataset provides a comprehensive clean collection of indoor pointcloud scans, totaling over 695 million points and indoor scans of 270 rooms.
dcterms:title: Stanford Large-Scale 3D Indoor Spaces Dataset (S3DIS)

dcterms:creator: A. Gaidon
Q. Wang
Y. Cabon
E. Vig
dcterms:description: The Virtual KITTI dataset contains simulated LiDAR data acquired through 50 annotated monocular videos generated from various urban settings, producing dense pointclouds with 13 semantic classes.
dcterms:title: Virtual KITTI Dataset (vKITTI)
